pr_title: Update response server deployment credentials to include the registra…

timeline.message: Update response server deployment credentials to include the registration client id/key and WCP user/password.

timeline.bodyText: Fine for now but these should eventually be GKE secrets.
timeline.author: kuoyuchi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,13 +38,13 @@ spec:
             - name: AUTH_SERVER_URL
               value: "35.243.237.139:50000"
             - name: REGISTRATION_CLIENT_ID
-              value: "dummy-value"
+              value: "test_client_id_rs"
             - name: REGISTRATION_CLIENT_SECRET
-              value: "dummy-value"
+              value: "test_secret_key"
             - name: WCP_USER
-              value: "dummy-value"
+              value: "com.labkey.fda"
             - name: WCP_PASS
-              value: "dummy-value"
+              value: "83d92ad3-ec27-424b-af92-fa7aa9a88c7b"

replies.bodyText: Changed to use GKE secrets. PTAL
replies.author: wamills

timeline.message: Use secret for response server credentials.
